main event: A yellow circular object was observed moving erratically at Bitburg AB, Germany, on February 9, 1961.
interesting points: The object was seen at a height of 7-10 degrees above the horizon for 30 minutes., It was noted to have an erratic course and appeared to disappear towards the west., No unusual sounds or light waves were detected during the observation., Military personnel corroborated the sighting, but some believed it to be a celestial body., The object was described as being the size of a half dollar held at arm's length.
witness description: Military personnel on base who observed the sighting
